SlagDoc:Readable of Char

From Plasmaworks

Jump to: navigation, search

Aspect Readable<<Char>>

Methods

create_reader().Reader<<Char>>
to_List().Char[]
to_bytes().Byte[]

Base Types
ReadableType
Implicit Singletons
Global, ObjectManager, Math, BitwiseOperations, DegreesManager, RadiansManager, RandomNumberGenerator


Overview

Base aspect for any object that can create a reader of type '$DataType'. To make a Readable class, incorporate this aspect and implement create_reader().

forEach loops automatically work with readable and reader types.


Methods

create_reader().Reader<<Char>>

Creates and returns a reader capable of reading the data from this object.


to_List().Char[]

Converts this Readable data into a list. Creates a reader and fowards the call to it.


to_bytes().Byte[]

Turns this Readable Char data into a Byte[] list. Available for Readable<<Char>> types only.
